name: Blue's Broken Heart
description:
PITCH

You're in a closed arena, a ball bounces everywhere, you have to catch it. But if it hurts you, you die. At each bounce, the ball destroy a little bit the platforms you stand on. Try to catch the ball before the ground is fully destroy!

CONTROLS

AD - To move

E - To catch the balls

SPACE - To jump

OUR TEAM

Game Designers: Aven - Niteves

Game Artists: Cerberus - Cirrostratus

Game Developers: Kevin - ceceboki0710

Sound Designer: HoWinG

CONTEXT

This is a game made during the Mix&Jam 2020. The team has been created one minute before the beginning of the Jam and just a few os us are knowing themselves. We're coming from different countries (US, UK, France, Belgium) and it was a pleasure to work with each other, even if it was tricky sometimes!
